name: Spidey's Friend and Foe: The Lizard Trivia Game | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: According to the various comic book series, what is Connors' profession?
questions.explanation:
Biologist.

	Curt Connors served in the United States Army as a medic and battlefield surgeon and was wounded in service. Once he became a civilian, he began his career as a genius biologist.

questions.text: According to the the movie "Spider-Man 3", what is Connors' profession?
questions.explanation:
Physicist.

	Actor Dylan Baker played Connors in the first three "Spider-Man" films. In the third film, he proclaims: "I'm a physicist, not a biologist!" Baker is married to stage actress Becky Ann Baker.

questions.text: For a short period of time, the Lizard was at odds with another reptillian villain. What was the scaly fiend known as?
questions.explanation:
The Iguana.

	The Iguana was a mutated iguana that held a hypnotic control over Connors, one that eventually broken. Connors became the Lizard in order to defeat the Iguana, but the two later allied and fought Spider-Man!

questions.text: In which year did The Lizard first appear?
questions.explanation:
1963.

	Both Connors the biologist and his scaly alter ego were introduced in the sixth issue of the first volume of "The Amazing Spider-Man", dated November 1963. He was created by Stan Lee and Steve Ditko, just like his rival, Spider-Man.

True.

	Due in part to corporate negligence, Martha Connors and her son Billy were both stricken with cancer. While Billy survived and became estranged from his father, Martha sadly did not, leaving Doctor Connors a widower.

questions.text: In the 616 Marvel universe, Lizard's skin is a scaly green. What is his skin color in the Ultimate universe?
questions.explanation:
Purple.

	Ultimate Lizard is based off of a basilisk lizard, complete with purple skin! Basilisk lizards are known for their ability to run on water for brief periods of time, such as when fleeing from a predator.

questions.text: Which villain hypnotized the Lizard into becoming her servant?
questions.explanation:
Calypso.

	Calypso has voodoo powers, which she used to bring the Lizard under her spell. Affiliated at time with Kraven the Hunter, she became a threat for Spider-Man in the early 90's.

questions.text: The Lizard took part in the Secret Wars.
questions.explanation:
True.

	In the 12-part limited series, the Lizard was a featured villain, whose absence from Earth caused his wife to seperate from him. In the 1990's animated Spider-Man series, the Lizard was shown to be under Connors' control.

questions.text: Which other person did Connors, as the Lizard, inject with the Lizard serum?
questions.explanation:
Billy Connors.

	Father and son became two marauding lizards, but were stopped once again. Connors, in doing this, was under the influence of a strange meteorite.

False.

	Connors calls Florida his birthplace, and it was in the Everglades that Spider-Man and the Lizard had their first encounter! Although he has since moved to New York City, he has found another habitat-the sewers!
